name: Jet-Boots Knight
description:
Jet boots Knight is a sidescrolling shmup that let's you plan your next move in slow motion. Whenever you move or shoot, time slows down so that execute your moves flawlessly.

Currently this project is in a "proof of concept" stage.  There's only one playable level which I made to test out the controls. The game has been built from the ground up as a android game but there's also a windows version with mouse controls. The windows version isn't perfect but it'll have to do until I implement gamepad support.

I'd love it if you try it out. There aren't many good Twin stick shooter games on android so I really want this to succeed. You can help me out by playing the game and giving me your feedback through this link:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScySzFiJFqu4xPZZyy3Xe6yasbcWvrjugXSC9Z_...
